title: I don't understand coin's build path
body: Why is the ancient coin combined with a fairy charm if it gives no mana regen and instead gives hp regen when combined? Shouldn't it still be combined with a a healing bead because it makes no sense to lose stats when combining.

replies.body: That's an oops on our part. Should be fixed in the next patch.

While you are at it, can you take {{item:2053}} out of ARAM?

All the items it can build into have been removed from that mode..so why should that item still be there?
